title.raw: 《衛將軍驃騎列傳》 Biography of Cavalry General Wei

sentences.zh: 大將軍衛青者，平陽人也。

translations.literal: Da jiang jun Wei Qing zhe, Ping yang ren ye.
translations.idiomatic: Grand general Wei Qing, Pingyang person.

sentences.zh: 其父鄭季，為吏，給事平陽侯家，與侯妾衛媼通，生青。

translations.literal: Qi fu Zheng Ji, wei li, ge shi Ping yang hou jia, yu hou bie Wei ao tong, sheng Qing.
translations.idiomatic: His father Zheng Ji, was official, served Pingyang hou house, with hou concubine Wei ao intercourse, gave birth Qing.

sentences.zh: 青同母兄衛長子，而姊衛子夫自平陽公主家得幸天子，故冒姓為衛氏。

translations.literal: Qing tong mu xiong di Wei Chang zi, er zi Wei Zi fu zi Ping yang gong zhu jia de xing tian zi, gu mao xing wei Wei shi.
translations.idiomatic: Qing same mother elder brother Wei Changzi, and sister Wei Zifu from Pingyang princess house got favored emperor, therefore falsely surname as Wei clan.

sentences.zh: 字仲卿。

translations.literal: Zi Zhong qing.
translations.idiomatic: Styled Zhongqing.

sentences.zh: 長子更字長君。

translations.literal: Chang zi geng zi Chang jun.
translations.idiomatic: Changzi moreover styled Changjun.

sentences.zh: 長君母號為衛媼。

translations.literal: Chang jun mu hao wei Wei ao.
translations.idiomatic: Changjun mother named Wei ao.

sentences.zh: 媼長女衛孺，次女少兒，次女即子夫。

translations.literal: Ao zhang nu Wei ru, ci nu Shao er, ci nu ji Zi fu.
translations.idiomatic: Ao eldest daughter Wei ru, second daughter Shao er, third daughter namely Zifu.

sentences.zh: 後子夫男弟步、廣皆冒衛氏。

translations.literal: Hou Zi fu nan di Bu, Guang jie mao Wei shi.
translations.idiomatic: After Zifu younger brother Bu, Guang all falsely Wei clan.

sentences.zh: 青為侯家人，少時歸其父，其父使牧羊。

translations.literal: Qing wei hou jia ren, shao shi gui qi fu, qi fu shi mu yang.
translations.idiomatic: Qing as hou house person, young time returned his father, his father made herd sheep.

sentences.zh: 先母之子皆奴畜之，不以為兄弟數。

translations.literal: Xian mu zhi zi jie nu xu zhi, bu yi wei xiong di shu.
translations.idiomatic: Step mother children all enslaved him, not considered brothers number.

sentences.zh: 青嘗從入至甘泉居室，有一鉗徒相青曰：「貴人也，官至封侯。」

translations.literal: Qing chang cong ru zhi Gan quan ju shi, you yi qian tu xiang Qing yue: "Gui ren ye, guan zhi feng hou."
translations.idiomatic: Qing once followed entered to Ganquan residence room, had one shackled convict divined Qing said: "Noble person, office to sealed hou."

sentences.zh: 青笑曰：「人奴之生，得毋笞罵即足矣，安得封侯事乎！」

translations.literal: Qing xiao yue: "Ren nu zhi sheng, de wu chi ma ji zu yi, an de feng hou shi hu!"
translations.idiomatic: Qing smiled said: "Person slave birth, got no whipped cursed then sufficient, how get sealed hou affairs!"

sentences.zh: 青壯，為侯家騎，從平陽主。

translations.literal: Qing zhuang, wei hou jia qi, cong Ping yang zhu.
translations.idiomatic: Qing grown, as hou house cavalry, followed Pingyang lord.

sentences.zh: 建元二年春，青姊子夫得入宮幸上。

translations.literal: Jian yuan er nian chun, Qing zi Zi fu de ru gong xing shang.
translations.idiomatic: Jian yuan second year spring, Qing sister Zifu got entered palace favored emperor.

sentences.zh: 皇后，堂邑大長公主女也，無子，妒。

translations.literal: Huang hou, Tang yi da chang gong zhu nu ye, wu zi, du.
translations.idiomatic: Empress, Tangyi great long princess daughter, no sons, jealous.

sentences.zh: 大長公主聞衛子夫幸，有身，妒之，乃使人捕青。

translations.literal: Da chang gong zhu wen Wei Zi fu xing, you shen, du zhi, nai shi ren bu Qing.
translations.idiomatic: Great long princess heard Wei Zifu favored, had body, jealous it, then sent people captured Qing.

sentences.zh: 青時給事建章，未知名。

translations.literal: Qing shi ge shi Jian zhang, wei ming zhi.
translations.idiomatic: Qing at time served Jianzhang, not known.

sentences.zh: 大長公主執囚青，欲殺之。

translations.literal: Da chang gong zhu zhi qiu Qing, yu sha zhi.
translations.idiomatic: Great long princess held imprisoned Qing, wanted kill him.

sentences.zh: 其友騎郎公孫敖與壯士往篡取之，以故得不死。

translations.literal: Qi you qi lang Gong sun Ao yu zhuang shi wang cuan qu zhi, yi gu de bu si.
translations.idiomatic: His friend cavalry imperial attendant Gongsun Ao with strong men went forcibly took him, therefore got not die.

sentences.zh: 上聞，乃召青為建章監，侍中，及同母昆弟貴，賞賜數日閒累千金。

translations.literal: Shang wen, nai zhao Qing wei Jian zhang jian, shi zhong, ji tong mu kun di gui, shang ci shu ri jian lei qian jin.
translations.idiomatic: Emperor heard, then summoned Qing as Jianzhang monitor, palace attendant, and same mother cousins noble, reward granted several days between accumulated thousand jin.

sentences.zh: 孺為太仆公孫賀妻。

translations.literal: Ru wei tai pu Gong sun He qi.
translations.idiomatic: Ru became taipu Gongsun He wife.

sentences.zh: 少兒故與陳掌通，上召貴掌。

translations.literal: Shao er gu yu Chen Zhang tong, shang zhao gui Zhang.
translations.idiomatic: Shao er originally with Chen Zhang intercourse, emperor summoned honored Zhang.

sentences.zh: 公孫敖由此益貴。

translations.literal: Gong sun Ao you ci yi gui.
translations.idiomatic: Gongsun Ao from this moreover noble.

sentences.zh: 子夫為夫人。

translations.literal: Zi fu wei fu ren.
translations.idiomatic: Zifu became lady.

sentences.zh: 青為大中大夫。

translations.literal: Qing wei da zhong da fu.
translations.idiomatic: Qing became grand central grand master.

sentences.zh: 元光五年，青為車騎將軍，擊匈奴，出上谷；

translations.literal: Yuan guang wu nian, Qing wei che qi jiang jun, ji Xiong nu, chu Shang gu;
translations.idiomatic: Yuanguang fifth year, Qing became chariot cavalry general, attacked Xiongnu, out Shanggu;

sentences.zh: 太仆公孫賀為輕車將軍，出雲中；

translations.literal: Tai pu Gong sun He wei qing che jiang jun, chu Yun zhong;
translations.idiomatic: Taipu Gongsun He became light chariot general, out Yunzhong;

sentences.zh: 大中大夫公孫敖為騎將軍，出代郡；

translations.literal: Da zhong da fu Gong sun Ao wei qi jiang jun, chu Dai jun;
translations.idiomatic: Grand central grand master Gongsun Ao became cavalry general, out Daijun;

sentences.zh: 衛尉李廣為驍騎將軍，出雁門：軍各萬騎。

translations.literal: Wei wei Li Guang wei xiao qi jiang jun, chu Yan men: jun ge wan qi.
translations.idiomatic: Guard wei Li Guang became fierce cavalry general, out Yanmen: armies each ten thousand cavalry.

sentences.zh: 青至蘢城，斬首虜數百。

translations.literal: Qing zhi Wei cheng, zhan shou lu shu bai.
translations.idiomatic: Qing arrived Weicheng, beheaded heads captives several hundred.

sentences.zh: 騎將軍敖亡七千騎；

translations.literal: Qi jiang jun Ao wang qi qian qi;
translations.idiomatic: Cavalry general Ao lost seven thousand cavalry;

sentences.zh: 衛尉李廣為虜所得，得脫歸：皆當斬，贖為庶人。

translations.literal: Wei wei Li Guang wei lu suo de, de tuo gui: jie dang zhan, shu wei shu ren.
translations.idiomatic: Guard wei Li Guang by enemy captured, got escape returned: all should behead, redeemed as commoners.

sentences.zh: 賀亦無功。

translations.literal: He yi wu gong.
translations.idiomatic: He also no merit.

sentences.zh: 元朔元年春，衛夫人有男，立為皇后。

translations.literal: Yuan shuo yi nian chun, Wei fu ren you nan, li wei huang hou.
translations.idiomatic: Yuanshuo first year spring, Wei lady had male, established as empress.

sentences.zh: 其秋，青為車騎將軍，出雁門，三萬騎擊匈奴，斬首虜數千人。

translations.literal: Qi qiu, Qing wei che qi jiang jun, chu Yan men, san wan qi ji Xiong nu, zhan shou lu shu qian ren.
translations.idiomatic: Its autumn, Qing became chariot cavalry general, out Yanmen, three ten thousand cavalry attacked Xiongnu, beheaded heads captives several thousand people.

sentences.zh: 明年，匈奴入殺遼西太守，虜略漁陽二千餘人，敗韓將軍軍。

translations.literal: Ming nian, Xiong nu ru sha Liao xi tai shou, lu lve Yu yang er qian yu ren, bai Han jiang jun jun.
translations.idiomatic: Next year, Xiongnu entered killed Liaoxi governor, plundered captured Yuyang two thousand remainder people, defeated Han general army.

sentences.zh: 漢令將軍李息擊之，出代；

translations.literal: Han ling jiang jun Li Xi ji zhi, chu Dai;
translations.idiomatic: Han ordered general Li Xi attacked them, out Dai;

sentences.zh: 令車騎將軍青出雲中以西至高闕。

translations.literal: Ling che qi jiang jun Qing chu Yun zhong yi xi zhi Gao que.
translations.idiomatic: Ordered chariot cavalry general Qing out Yunzhong west to Gaoque.

sentences.zh: 遂略河南地，至于隴西，捕首虜數千，畜數十萬，走白羊、樓煩王。

translations.literal: Sui lve He nan di, zhi yu Long xi, bu shou lu shu qian, chu shu shi wan, zou Bai yang, Lou fan wang.
translations.idiomatic: Then plundered Henan land, arrived at Longxi, captured heads captives several thousand, livestock several ten thousand, fled Baiyang, Loufan wang.

sentences.zh: 遂以河南地為朔方郡。

translations.literal: Sui yi He nan di wei Shuo fang jun.
translations.idiomatic: Then with Henan land made Shuofang commandery.

sentences.zh: 以三千八百戶封青為長平侯。

translations.literal: Yi san qian ba bai hu feng Qing wei Chang ping hou.
translations.idiomatic: With three thousand eight hundred households sealed Qing as Changping hou.

sentences.zh: 青校尉蘇建有功，以千一百戶封建為平陵侯。

translations.literal: Qing xiao wei Su Jian you gong, yi qian yi bai hu feng Jian wei Ping ling hou.
translations.idiomatic: Qing colonel Su Jian had merit, with thousand one hundred households sealed Jian as Pingling hou.

sentences.zh: 使建筑朔方城。

translations.literal: Shi jian zhu Shuo fang cheng.
translations.idiomatic: Made build Shuofang city.

sentences.zh: 青校尉張次公有功，封為岸頭侯。

translations.literal: Qing xiao wei Zhang Ci gong you gong, feng wei An tou hou.
translations.idiomatic: Qing colonel Zhang Ci had merit, sealed as Antou hou.

sentences.zh: 天子曰：「匈奴逆天理，亂人倫，暴長虐老，以盜竊為務，行詐諸蠻夷，造謀藉兵，數為邊害，故興師遣將，以征厥罪。

translations.literal: Tian zi yue: "Xiong nu ni tian li, luan ren lun, bao zhang nue lao, yi dao qie wei wu, xing zha zhu man yi, zao mou jie bing, shu wei bian hai, gu xing shi qian jiang, yi zheng jue zui.
translations.idiomatic: Emperor said: "Xiongnu violate heaven principle, confuse human relationships, tyrannize strong bully weak, with thievery as affairs, practice deception various barbarians, make plots borrow troops, repeatedly for border harm, therefore raise troops send generals, to punish their crimes.

sentences.zh: 詩不云乎，『薄伐玁狁，至于太原』，『出車彭彭，城彼朔方』。

translations.literal: Shi bu yun hu, 'bo fa Xian Yun, zhi yu Tai yuan', 'chu che Peng Peng, cheng bi Shuo fang'."
translations.idiomatic: Poetry not say, 'thin attacked Xianyun, to Taiyuan', 'out chariots Peng Peng, walled that Shuofang'."

sentences.zh: 今車騎將軍青度西河至高闕，獲首虜二千三百級，車輜畜產畢收為鹵，已封為列侯，遂西定河南地，按榆谿舊塞，絕梓領，梁北河，討蒲泥，破符離，斬輕銳之卒，捕伏聽者三千七十一級，執訊獲丑，驅馬牛羊百有餘萬，全甲兵而還，益封青三千戶。」

translations.literal: Jin che qi jiang jun Qing du Xi he zhi Gao que, huo shou lu er qian san bai ji, che zi chu chan bi shou wei lu, yi feng wei lie hou, sui xi ding He nan di, an Yu xi jiu sai, jue Zi ling, Liang bei he, tao Pu ni, po Fu li, zhan qing rui zhi zu, bu fu ting zhe san qian qi shi yi ji, zhi xun huo chou, qu ma niu yang bai you yu wan, quan jia bing er huan, yi feng Qing san qian hu."
translations.idiomatic: Now chariot cavalry general Qing crossed Xihe to Gaoque, obtained heads captives two thousand three hundred levels, chariots baggage livestock produce all received as booty, already sealed as lie hou, then west settled Henan land, pressed Yuxi old barrier, cut Ziling, Liang north river, attacked Punni, broke Fuli, beheaded light sharp troops, captured hidden listeners three thousand seven ten one levels, took captives obtained leaders, drove horses oxen sheep hundred remainder ten thousand, complete armor weapons and returned, increased sealed Qing three thousand households."

sentences.zh: 其明年，匈奴入殺代郡太守友，入略鴈門千餘人。

translations.literal: Qi ming nian, Xiong nu ru sha Dai jun tai shou You, ru lve Yan men qian yu ren.
translations.idiomatic: Its next year, Xiongnu entered killed Daijun governor You, entered plundered Yanmen thousand remainder people.

sentences.zh: 其明年，匈奴大入代、定襄、上郡，殺略漢數千人。

translations.literal: Qi ming nian, Xiong nu da ru Dai, Ding xiang, Shang jun, sha lve Han shu qian ren.
translations.idiomatic: Its next year, Xiongnu greatly entered Dai, Dingxiang, Shangjun, killed plundered Han several thousand people.

sentences.zh: 其明年，元朔之五年春，漢令車騎將軍青將三萬騎，出高闕；

translations.literal: Qi ming nian, Yuan shuo zhi wu nian chun, Han ling che qi jiang jun Qing jiang san wan qi, chu Gao que;
translations.idiomatic: Its next year, Yuanshuo fifth year spring, Han ordered chariot cavalry general Qing led three ten thousand cavalry, out Gaoque;

sentences.zh: 衛尉蘇建為游擊將軍，左內史李沮為彊弩將軍，太仆公孫賀為騎將軍，代相李蔡為輕車將軍，皆領屬車騎將軍，俱出朔方；

translations.literal: Wei wei Su Jian wei you ji jiang jun, zuo nei shi Li Ju wei qiang nu jiang jun, tai pu Gong sun He wei qi jiang jun, dai xiang Li Cai wei qing che jiang jun, jie ling shu che qi jiang jun, ju chu Shuo fang;
translations.idiomatic: Guard wei Su Jian became youji general, left interior secretary Li Ju became qiangnu general, taipu Gongsun He became cavalry general, dai chancellor Li Cai became light chariot general, all led belonged chariot cavalry general, together out Shuofang;

sentences.zh: 大行李息、岸頭侯張次公為將軍，出右北平：咸擊匈奴。

translations.literal: Da xing Li Xi, An tou hou Zhang Ci gong wei jiang jun, chu you bei ping: xian ji Xiong nu.
translations.idiomatic: Great marshal Li Xi, Antou hou Zhang Ci became generals, out Youbeiping: all attacked Xiongnu.

sentences.zh: 匈奴右賢王當衛青等兵，以為漢兵不能至此，飲醉。

translations.literal: Xiong nu you xian wang dang Wei Qing deng bing, yi wei Han bing bu neng zhi ci, yin zui.
translations.idiomatic: Xiongnu right worthy wang faced Wei Qing etc. troops, considered Han troops not able arrive here, drank drunk.

sentences.zh: 漢兵夜至，圍右賢王，右賢王驚，夜逃，獨與其愛妾一人壯騎數百馳，潰圍北去。

translations.literal: Han bing ye zhi, wei you xian wang, you xian wang jing, ye tao, du yu qi ai bie yi ren zhuang qi shu bai chi, kui wei bei qu.
translations.idiomatic: Han troops night arrived, surrounded right worthy wang, right worthy wang alarmed, night fled, alone with his beloved concubine one person strong cavalry several hundred galloped, broke surround north left.

sentences.zh: 漢輕騎校尉郭成等逐數百里，不及，得右賢裨王十餘人，眾男女萬五千餘人，畜數千百萬，於是引兵而還。

translations.literal: Han qing qi xiao wei Guo Cheng deng zhu shu bai li, bu ji, de you xian pi wang shi yu ren, zhong nan nu wan wu qian yu ren, chu shu qian bai wan, yu shi yin bing er huan.
translations.idiomatic: Han light cavalry colonel Guo Cheng etc. pursued several hundred li, not caught, got right worthy deputy wang ten remainder people, multitude males females ten five thousand remainder people, livestock several thousand ten thousand, thereupon led troops returned.

sentences.zh: 至塞，天子使使者持大將軍印，即軍中拜車騎將軍青為大將軍，諸將皆以兵屬大將軍，大將軍立號而歸。

translations.literal: Zhi sai, tian zi shi shi zhe chi da jiang jun yin, ji jun zhong bai che qi jiang jun Qing wei da jiang jun, zhu jiang jie yi bing shu da jiang jun, da jiang jun li hao er gui.
translations.idiomatic: Arrived pass, emperor sent envoy held grand general seal, in army middle appointed chariot cavalry general Qing as grand general, various generals all with troops belonged grand general, grand general established title and returned.

sentences.zh: 天子曰：「大將軍青躬率戎士，師大捷，獲匈奴王十有餘人，益封青六千戶。」

translations.literal: Tian zi yue: "Da jiang jun Qing gong lv rong shi, shi da jie, huo Xiong nu wang shi you yu ren, yi feng Qing liu qian hu."
translations.idiomatic: Emperor said: "Grand general Qing personally led soldiers, army great victory, obtained Xiongnu wang ten remainder people, increased sealed Qing six thousand households."

sentences.zh: 而封青子伉為宜春侯，青子不疑為陰安侯，青子登為發干侯。

translations.literal: Er feng Qing zi Kang wei Yi chun hou, Qing zi bu yi wei Yin an hou, Qing zi Deng wei Fa gan hou.
translations.idiomatic: And sealed Qing son Kang as Yichun hou, Qing son Buyi as Yinan hou, Qing son Deng as Fagan hou.

sentences.zh: 青固謝曰：「臣幸得待罪行閒，賴陛下神靈，軍大捷，皆諸校尉力戰之功也。

translations.literal: Qing gu xie yue: "Chen xing de dai zui xing jian, lai bixia shen ling, jun da jie, jie zhu xiao wei li zhan zhi gong ye.
translations.idiomatic: Qing firmly declined said: "Subject fortunately got serve guilt march between, relied your majesty divine spirit, army great victory, all various colonels vigorous battle merit.

sentences.zh: 陛下幸已益封臣青。

translations.literal: Bixia xing yi yi feng chen Qing.
translations.idiomatic: Your majesty fortunately already increased sealed subject Qing.

sentences.zh: 臣青子在繦緥中，未有勤勞，上幸列地封為三侯，非臣待罪行閒所以勸士力戰之意也。

translations.literal: Chen Qing zi zai ruan ruan zhong, wei you qin lao, shang xing lie di feng wei san hou, fei chen dai zui xing jian suo yi quan shi li zhan zhi yi ye.
translations.idiomatic: Subject Qing sons in swaddling clothes middle, not had diligent labor, emperor fortunately listed lands sealed as three hou, not subject serve guilt march between so encourage soldiers vigorous battle intent.

sentences.zh: 伉等三人何敢受封！」

translations.literal: Kang deng san ren he gan shou feng!"
translations.idiomatic: Kang etc. three people how dare receive seal!"

sentences.zh: 天子曰：「我非忘諸校尉功也，今固且圖之。」

translations.literal: Tian zi yue: "Wo fei wang zhu xiao wei gong ye, jin gu qie tu zhi."
translations.idiomatic: Emperor said: "I not forget various colonels merit, now firmly moreover plan them."

sentences.zh: 乃詔御史曰：「護軍都尉公孫敖三從大將軍擊匈奴，常護軍，傅校獲王，以千五百戶封敖為合騎侯。

translations.literal: Nai zhao yu shi yue: "Hu jun du wei Gong sun Ao san cong da jiang jun ji Xiong nu, chang hu jun, fu jiao huo wang, yi qian wu bai hu feng Ao wei He qi hou.
translations.idiomatic: Then decreed imperial censor: "Protect army commandery governor Gongsun Ao three followed grand general attacked Xiongnu, often protected army, escorted colonels obtained wang, with thousand five hundred households sealed Ao as Heqi hou.

sentences.zh: 都尉韓說從大將軍出窳渾，至匈奴右賢王庭，為麾下搏戰獲王，以千三百戶封說為龍頟侯。

translations.literal: Du wei Han Shuo cong da jiang jun chu Yu hun, zhi Xiong nu you xian wang ting, wei hui xia bo zhan huo wang, yi qian san bai hu feng Shuo wei Long e hou.
translations.idiomatic: Commandery governor Han Shuo followed grand general out Yuhun, to Xiongnu right worthy wang court, as command below fought obtained wang, with thousand three hundred households sealed Shuo as Longe hou.

sentences.zh: 騎將軍公孫賀從大將軍獲王，以千三百戶封賀為南窌侯。

translations.literal: Qi jiang jun Gong sun He cong da jiang jun huo wang, yi qian san bai hu feng He wei Nan jiao hou.
translations.idiomatic: Cavalry general Gongsun He followed grand general obtained wang, with thousand three hundred households sealed He as Nanjiao hou.

sentences.zh: 輕車將軍李蔡再從大將軍獲王，以千六百戶封蔡為樂安侯。

translations.literal: Qing che jiang jun Li Cai zai cong da jiang jun huo wang, yi qian liu bai hu feng Cai wei Le an hou.
translations.idiomatic: Light chariot general Li Cai again followed grand general obtained wang, with thousand six hundred households sealed Cai as Lean hou.

sentences.zh: 校尉李朔，校尉趙不虞，校尉公孫戎奴，各三從大將軍獲王，以千三百戶封朔為涉軹侯，以千三百戶封不虞為隨成侯，以千三百戶封戎奴為從平侯。

translations.literal: Xiao wei Li Shuo, xiao wei Zhao bu yu, xiao wei Gong sun Rong nu, ge san cong da jiang jun huo wang, yi qian san bai hu feng Shuo wei She zhi hou, yi qian san bai hu feng bu yu wei Sui cheng hou, yi qian san bai hu feng Rong nu wei Cong ping hou.
translations.idiomatic: Colonel Li Shuo, colonel Zhao Buyu, colonel Gongsun Rongnu, each three followed grand general obtained wang, with thousand three hundred households sealed Shuo as Shezhi hou, with thousand three hundred households sealed Buyu as Suicheng hou, with thousand three hundred households sealed Rongnu as Congping hou.

sentences.zh: 將軍李沮、李息及校尉豆如意有功，賜爵關內侯，食邑各三百戶。」

translations.literal: Jiang jun Li Ju, Li Xi ji xiao wei Dou ru yi you gong, ci jue guan nei hou, shi yi ge san bai hu."
translations.idiomatic: General Li Ju, Li Xi and colonel Dou Ruyi had merit, granted nobility Guannei hou, ate fief each three hundred households."

sentences.zh: 其秋，匈奴入代，殺都尉朱英。

translations.literal: Qi qiu, Xiong nu ru Dai, sha du wei Zhu Ying.
translations.idiomatic: Its autumn, Xiongnu entered Dai, killed commandery governor Zhu Ying.

sentences.zh: 其明年春，大將軍青出定襄，合騎侯敖為中將軍，太仆賀為左將軍，翕侯趙信為前將軍，衛尉蘇建為右將軍，郎中令李廣為後將軍，右內史李沮為彊弩將軍，咸屬大將軍，斬首數千級而還。

translations.literal: Qi ming nian chun, da jiang jun Qing chu Ding xiang, he qi hou Ao wei zhong jiang jun, tai pu He wei zuo jiang jun, Xi hou Zhao Xin wei qian jiang jun, wei wei Su Jian wei you jiang jun, lang zhong ling Li Guang wei hou jiang jun, you nei shi Li Ju wei qiang nu jiang jun, xian shu da jiang jun, zhan shou shu qian ji er huan.
translations.idiomatic: Its next year spring, grand general Qing out Dingxiang, heqi hou Ao became middle general, taipu He became left general, Xi hou Zhao Xin became front general, guard wei Su Jian became right general, palace secretary Li Guang became rear general, right interior secretary Li Ju became qiangnu general, all belonged grand general, beheaded heads several thousand levels and returned.

sentences.zh: 月餘，悉復出定襄擊匈奴，斬首虜萬餘人。

translations.literal: Yue yu, xi fu chu Ding xiang ji Xiong nu, zhan shou lu wan yu ren.
translations.idiomatic: Month remainder, all again out Dingxiang attacked Xiongnu, beheaded heads captives ten thousand remainder people.

sentences.zh: 右將軍建、前將軍信并軍三千餘騎，獨逢單于兵，與戰一日餘，漢兵且盡。

translations.literal: You jiang jun Jian, qian jiang jun Xin bing jun san qian yu qi, du feng chan yu bing, yu zhan yi ri yu, Han bing jie jin.
translations.idiomatic: Right general Jian, front general Xin combined army three thousand remainder cavalry, alone encountered chanyu troops, with battled one day remainder, Han troops almost exhausted.

sentences.zh: 前將軍故胡人，降為翕侯，見急，匈奴誘之，遂將其餘騎可八百，奔降單于。

translations.literal: Qian jiang jun gu Hu ren, xiang wei Xi hou, jian ji, Xiong nu you zhi, sui jiang qi yu qi ke ba bai, ben xiang chan yu.
translations.idiomatic: Front general originally Hu person, surrendered became Xi hou, saw emergency, Xiongnu lured him, then led his remainder cavalry could eight hundred, fled surrendered chanyu.

sentences.zh: 右將軍蘇建盡亡其軍，獨以身得亡去，自歸大將軍。

translations.literal: You jiang jun Su Jian jin wang qi jun, du yi shen de wang qu, zi gui da jiang jun.
translations.idiomatic: Right general Su Jian completely lost his army, alone with body got escape go, self returned grand general.

sentences.zh: 大將軍問其罪正閎、長史安、議郎周霸等：「建當云何？」

translations.literal: Da jiang jun wen qi zui zheng Hong, chang shi An, yi lang Zhou Ba deng: "Jian dang yun he?"
translations.idiomatic: Grand general asked their crime adjudicator Hong, chancellor secretary An, discussion gentleman Zhou Ba etc.: "Jian should say what?"

sentences.zh: 霸曰：「自大將軍出，未嘗斬裨將。

translations.literal: Ba yue: "Zi da jiang jun chu, wei chang zhan pi jiang.
translations.idiomatic: Ba said: "From grand general out, never beheaded deputy generals.

sentences.zh: 今建棄軍，可斬以明將軍之威。」

translations.literal: Jin Jian qi jun, ke zhan yi ming jiang jun zhi wei."
translations.idiomatic: Now Jian abandoned army, can behead to show general might."

sentences.zh: 閎、安曰：「不然。

translations.literal: Hong, An yue: "Bu ran.
translations.idiomatic: Hong, An said: "Not so.

sentences.zh: 兵法『小敵之堅，大敵之禽也』。

translations.literal: Bing fa 'xiao di zhi jian, da di zhi qin ye'."
translations.idiomatic: Military method 'small enemy strong, big enemy captured'."

sentences.zh: 今建以數千當單于數萬，力戰一日餘，士盡，不敢有二心，自歸。

translations.literal: Jin Jian yi shu qian dang chan yu shu wan, li zhan yi ri yu, shi jin, bu gan you er xin, zi gui.
translations.idiomatic: Now Jian with several thousand faced chanyu several ten thousand, vigorously battled one day remainder, soldiers exhausted, not dared have two hearts, self returned.

sentences.zh: 自歸而斬之，是示後無反意也。

translations.literal: Zi gui er zhan zhi, shi hou wu fan yi ye.
translations.idiomatic: Self returned and behead him, shows later no return intent.

sentences.zh: 不當斬。」

translations.literal: Bu dang zhan."
translations.idiomatic: Not should behead."

sentences.zh: 大將軍曰：「青幸得以肺腑待罪行閒，不患無威，而霸說我以明威，甚失臣意。

translations.literal: Da jiang jun yue: "Qing xing de yi fei fu dai zui xing jian, bu huan wu wei, er Ba shuo wo yi ming wei, shen shi chen yi.
translations.idiomatic: Grand general said: "Qing fortunately got with viscera serve guilt march between, not worried no might, but Ba told me to show might, very lost subject intent.

sentences.zh: 且使臣職雖當斬將，以臣之尊寵而不敢自擅專誅於境外，而具歸天子，天子自裁之，於是以見為人臣不敢專權，不亦可乎？」

translations.literal: Qie shi chen zhi ji sui dang zhan jiang, yi chen zhi zun chong er bu gan zi shan zhuan zhu yu jing wai, er ju gui tian zi, tian zi zi cai zhi, yu yi yi jian wei ren chen bu gan zhuan quan, bu yi ke hu?"
translations.idiomatic: Moreover make subject position though should behead generals, with subject honor favored not dared self arrogate execute at border outside, but prepared returned emperor, emperor self decided it, thereupon with seen as person minister not dared monopolize power, not also can?"

sentences.zh: 軍吏皆曰「善」。

translations.literal: Jun li jie yue "shan".
translations.idiomatic: Army officials all said "good".

sentences.zh: 遂囚建詣行在所。

translations.literal: Sui qiu Jian yi xing zai suo.
translations.idiomatic: Then imprisoned Jian to emperor residence place.

sentences.zh: 入塞罷兵。

translations.literal: Ru sai ba bing.
translations.idiomatic: Entered pass dismissed troops.

sentences.zh: 是歲也，大將軍姊子霍去病年十八，幸，為天子ヰ中。

translations.literal: Shi sui ye, da jiang jun zi Huo Qu Bing nian shi ba, xing, wei tian zi zhi zhong.
translations.idiomatic: This year also, grand general sister son Huo Qubing age eighteen, favored, became emperor attendant.

sentences.zh: 善騎射，再從大將軍，受詔與壯士，為剽姚校尉，與輕勇騎八百直棄大軍數百里赴利，斬捕首虜過當。

translations.literal: Shan qi she, zai cong da jiang jun, shou zhao yu zhuang shi, wei piao yao xiao wei, yu qing yong qi ba bai zhi qi da jun shu bai li fu li, zhan bu shou lu guo dang.
translations.idiomatic: Good horsemanship archery, again followed grand general, received decree with strong men, became Piaoyao colonel, with light brave cavalry eight hundred straight abandoned main army several hundred li pursued profit, beheaded captured heads captives over proper.

sentences.zh: 於是天子曰：「剽姚校尉去病斬首虜二千二十八級，及相國、當戶，斬單于大父行籍若侯產，生捕季父羅姑比，再冠軍，以千六百戶封去病為冠軍侯。

translations.literal: Yu shi tian zi yue: "Piao yao xiao wei Qu Bing zhan shou lu er qian er shi ba ji, ji xiang guo, dang hu, zhan chan yu da fu xing Ji ruo hou chan, sheng bu ji fu Luo gu bi, zai guan jun, yi qian liu bai hu feng Qu Bing wei Guan jun hou.
translations.idiomatic: Thereupon emperor said: "Piaoyao colonel Huo Qubing beheaded heads captives two thousand twenty eight levels, and chancellor, dang hu, beheaded chanyu great uncle Xing Jiruo hou Chan, alive captured young uncle Luogu Bi, again crowned army, with thousand six hundred households sealed Huo Qubing as Guan jun hou.

sentences.zh: 上谷太守郝賢四從大將軍，捕斬首虜二千餘人，以千一百戶封賢為眾利侯。」

translations.literal: Shang gu tai shou Hao Xian si cong da jiang jun, bu zhan shou lu er qian yu ren, yi qian yi bai hu feng Xian wei Zhong li hou."
translations.idiomatic: Shanggu governor Hao Xian four followed grand general, captured beheaded heads captives two thousand remainder people, with thousand one hundred households sealed Xian as Zhongli hou."

sentences.zh: 是歲，失兩將軍軍，亡翕侯，軍功不多，故大將軍不益封。

translations.literal: Shi sui, shi liang jiang jun jun, wang Xi hou, jun gong bu duo, gu da jiang jun bu yi feng.
translations.idiomatic: This year, lost two generals army, perished Xi hou, army merit not many, therefore grand general not increased sealed.

sentences.zh: 右將軍建至，天子不誅，赦其罪，贖為庶人。

translations.literal: You jiang jun Jian zhi, tian zi bu zhu, she qi zui, shu wei shu ren.
translations.idiomatic: Right general Jian arrived, emperor not executed, pardoned his crime, redeemed as commoner.

sentences.zh: 大將軍既還，賜千金。

translations.literal: Da jiang jun ji huan, ci qian jin.
translations.idiomatic: Grand general already returned, granted thousand jin.

sentences.zh: 是時王夫人方幸於上，甯乘說大將軍曰：「將軍所以功未甚多，身食萬戶，三子皆為侯者，徒以皇后故也。

translations.literal: Shi shi Wang fu ren fang xing yu shang, Ning Cheng shuo da jiang jun yue: "Jiang jun suo yi gong wei shen duo, shen shi wan hu, san zi jie wei hou zhe, tu yi huang hou gu ye.
translations.idiomatic: At time Wang lady just favored with emperor, Ning Cheng advised grand general: "General what merit not very many, body ate ten thousand households, three sons all became hou, only because empress reason.

sentences.zh: 今王夫人幸而宗族未富貴，願將軍奉所賜千金為王夫人親壽。」

translations.literal: Jin Wang fu ren xing er zong zu wei fu gui, yuan jiang jun feng suo ci qian jin wei Wang fu ren qin shou."
translations.idiomatic: Now Wang lady favored but clan not rich noble, wish general offered what granted thousand jin for Wang lady close birthday."

sentences.zh: 大將軍乃以五百金為壽。

translations.literal: Da jiang jun nai yi wu bai jin wei shou.
translations.idiomatic: Grand general then with five hundred jin made birthday.

sentences.zh: 天子聞之，問大將軍，大將軍以實言，上乃拜甯乘為東海都尉。

translations.literal: Tian zi wen zhi, wen da jiang jun, da jiang jun yi shi yan, shang nai bai Ning Cheng wei Dong hai du wei.
translations.idiomatic: Emperor heard it, asked grand general, grand general with truth spoke, emperor then appointed Ning Cheng as Donghai commandery governor.

sentences.zh: 張騫從大將軍，以嘗使大夏，留匈奴中久，導軍，知善水草處，軍得以無饑渴，因前使絕國功，封騫博望侯。

translations.literal: Zhang Qian cong da jiang jun, yi chang shi Da Xia, liu Xiong nu zhong jiu, dao jun, zhi shan shui cao chu, jun de yi wu ji ke, yin qian shi jue guo gong, feng Qian Bo wang hou.
translations.idiomatic: Zhang Qian followed grand general, because once made Daxia, stayed Xiongnu middle long, guided army, knew good water grass places, army got not hungry thirsty, because previous mission cut off country merit, sealed Qian Bowang hou.

sentences.zh: 冠軍侯去病既侯三歲，元狩二年春，以冠軍侯去病為驃騎將軍，將萬騎出隴西，有功。

translations.literal: Guan jun hou Qu Bing ji hou san sui, Yuan shou er nian chun, yi Guan jun hou Qu Bing wei piao qi jiang jun, jiang wan qi chu Long xi, you gong.
translations.idiomatic: Champion hou Huo Qubing already hou three years, Yuanshou second year spring, with champion hou Huo Qubing became flying cavalry general, led ten thousand cavalry out Longxi, had merit.

sentences.zh: 天子曰：「驃騎將軍率戎士踰烏盭，討遬濮，涉狐奴，歷五王國，輜重人眾懾慴者弗取，冀獲單于子。

translations.literal: Tian zi yue: "Piao qi jiang jun lv rong shi yu Wu hui, tao Sui pu, she Hu nu, li wu wang guo, zi zhong ren zhong zhe fu qu, ji huo chan yu zi.
translations.idiomatic: Emperor said: "Flying cavalry general led soldiers crossed Wuhui, attacked Suipu, crossed Hunu, passed five wang countries, baggage multitude terrified not took, hoped obtain chanyu son.

sentences.zh: 轉戰六日，過焉支山千有餘里，合短兵，殺折蘭王，斬盧胡王，誅全甲，執渾邪王子及相國、都尉，首虜八千餘級，收休屠祭天金人，益封去病二千戶。」

translations.literal: Zhuan zhan liu ri, guo Yan zhi shan qian you yu li, he duan bing, sha zhe Lan wang, zhan Lu Hu wang, zhu quan jia, zhi Hun xie wang zi ji xiang guo, du wei, shou lu ba qian yu ji, shou Xiu tu ji tian jin ren, yi feng Qu Bing er qian hu."
translations.idiomatic: Transferred battle six days, passed Yanzhi mountain thousand remainder li, combined short weapons, killed Zhe Lan wang, beheaded Lu Hu wang, executed complete armor, captured Hunxie wang son and chancellor, commandery governor, heads captives eight thousand remainder levels, received Xiutu sacrifice heaven gold person, increased sealed Huo Qubing two thousand households."

sentences.zh: 其夏，驃騎將軍與合騎侯敖俱出北地，異道；

translations.literal: Qi xia, piao qi jiang jun yu he qi hou Ao ju chu Bei di, yi dao;
translations.idiomatic: Its summer, flying cavalry general with heqi hou Ao together out Beidi, different roads;

sentences.zh: 博望侯張騫、郎中令李廣俱出右北平，異道：皆擊匈奴。

translations.literal: Bo wang hou Zhang Qian, lang zhong ling Li Guang ju chu you bei ping, yi dao: jie ji Xiong nu.
translations.idiomatic: Bowang hou Zhang Qian, palace secretary Li Guang together out Youbeiping, different roads: all attacked Xiongnu.

sentences.zh: 郎中令將四千騎先至，博望侯將萬騎在後至。

translations.literal: Lang zhong ling jiang si qian qi xian zhi, Bo wang hou jiang wan qi zai hou zhi.
translations.idiomatic: Palace secretary led four thousand cavalry first arrived, Bowang hou led ten thousand cavalry later arrived.

sentences.zh: 匈奴左賢王將數萬騎圍郎中令，郎中令與戰二日，死者過半，所殺亦過當。

translations.literal: Xiong nu zuo xian wang jiang shu wan qi wei lang zhong ling, lang zhong ling yu zhan er ri, si zhe guo ban, suo sha yi guo dang.
translations.idiomatic: Xiongnu left worthy wang led several ten thousand cavalry surrounded palace secretary, palace secretary with battled two days, died over half, what killed also over proper.

sentences.zh: 博望侯至，匈奴兵引去。

translations.literal: Bo wang hou zhi, Xiong nu bing yin qu.
translations.idiomatic: Bowang hou arrived, Xiongnu troops led away.

sentences.zh: 博望侯坐行留，當斬，贖為庶人。

translations.literal: Bo wang hou zuo xing liu bu yu piao qi hui, dang zhan, shu wei shu ren.
translations.idiomatic: Bowang hou sat marched stayed not with flying cavalry met, should behead, redeemed as commoner.

sentences.zh: 而驃騎將軍出北地，已遂深入，與合騎侯失道，不相得，驃騎將軍踰居延至祁連山，捕首虜甚多。

translations.literal: Er piao qi jiang jun chu Bei di, yi sui shen ru, yu he qi hou shi dao, bu xiang de, piao qi jiang jun yu Ju yan zhi Qi lian shan, bu shou lu shen duo.
translations.idiomatic: And flying cavalry general out Beidi, already then deeply entered, with heqi hou lost road, not mutually got, flying cavalry general crossed Juyan to Qilian mountain, captured heads captives very many.

sentences.zh: 天子曰：「驃騎將軍踰居延，遂過小月氏，攻祁連山，得酋涂王，以眾降者二千五百人，斬首虜三萬二百級，獲五王，五王母，單于閼氏、王子五十九人，相國、將軍、當戶、都尉六十三人，師大率減什三，益封去病五千戶。

translations.literal: Tian zi yue: "Piao qi jiang jun yu Ju yan, sui guo xiao Yue zhi, gong Qi lian shan, de Qiu tu wang, yi zhong xiang zhe er qian wu bai ren, zhan shou lu san wan er bai ji, huo wu wang, wu wang mu, chan yu Yan zhi, wang zi wu shi jiu ren, xiang guo, jiang jun, dang hu, du wei liu shi san ren, shi da lv jian shi san, yi feng Qu Bing wu qian hu.
translations.idiomatic: Emperor said: "Flying cavalry general crossed Juyan, then passed small Yuezhi, attacked Qilian mountain, got Qiutu wang, with multitude surrendered two thousand five hundred people, beheaded heads captives three ten thousand two hundred levels, obtained five wang, five wang mothers, chanyu consort, wang sons fifty nine people, chancellors, generals, dang hu, commandery governors sixty three people, army greatly reduced ten three, increased sealed Huo Qubing five thousand households.

sentences.zh: 賜校尉從至小月氏爵左庶長。

translations.literal: Ci xiao wei cong zhi xiao Yue zhi jue zuo shu zhang.
translations.idiomatic: Granted colonels followed to small Yuezhi nobility left shuzhang.

sentences.zh: 鷹擊司馬破奴再從驃騎將軍斬遬濮王，捕稽沮王，千騎將得王、王母各一人，王子以下四十一人，捕虜三千三百三十人，前行捕虜千四百人，以千五百戶封破奴為從驃侯。

translations.literal: Ying ji si ma Po nu zai cong piao qi jiang jun zhan Sui pu wang, bu Ji ju wang, qian qi jiang de wang, wang mu ge yi ren, wang zi yi xia si shi yi ren, bu lu san qian san bai san shi ren, qian xing bu lu qian si bai ren, yi qian wu bai hu feng Po nu wei Cong piao hou.
translations.idiomatic: Eagle strike adjutant Po Nu again followed flying cavalry general beheaded Suipu wang, captured Jiju wang, thousand cavalry general got wang, wang mother each one person, wang sons below forty one people, captured captives three thousand three hundred thirty people, front marched captured captives thousand four hundred people, with thousand five hundred households sealed Po Nu as Congpiao hou.

sentences.zh: 校尉句王高不識，從驃騎將軍捕呼于屠王王子以下十一人，捕虜千七百六十八人，以千一百戶封不識為宜冠侯。

translations.literal: Xiao wei Gou wang Gao bu shi, cong piao qi jiang jun bu Hu yu tu wang wang zi yi xia shi yi ren, bu lu qian qi bai liu shi ba ren, yi qian yi bai hu feng bu shi wei Yi guan hou.
translations.idiomatic: Colonel Gou wang Gao Bushi, followed flying cavalry general captured Huyutu wang wang sons below eleven people, captured captives thousand seven hundred sixty eight people, with thousand one hundred households sealed Bushi as Yiguan hou.

sentences.zh: 校尉仆多有功，封為煇渠侯。」

translations.literal: Xiao wei Pu duo you gong, feng wei Hui qu hou."
translations.idiomatic: Colonel Pudu had merit, sealed as Huiqu hou."

sentences.zh: 合騎侯敖坐行留不與驃騎會，當斬，贖為庶人。

translations.literal: He qi hou Ao zuo xing liu bu yu piao qi hui, dang zhan, shu wei shu ren.
translations.idiomatic: Heqi hou Ao sat marched stayed not with flying cavalry met, should behead, redeemed as commoner.

sentences.zh: 諸宿將所將士馬兵亦不如驃騎，驃騎所將常選，然亦敢深入，常與壯騎先其大（將）軍，軍亦有天幸，未嘗困絕也。

translations.literal: Zhu su jiang suo jiang shi ma bing yi bu ru piao qi, piao qi suo jiang chang xuan, ran yi gan shen ru, chang yu zhuang qi xian qi da (jiang) jun, jun yi you tian xing, wei chang kun jue ye.
translations.idiomatic: Various veteran generals what led soldiers horses troops also not match flying cavalry, flying cavalry what led often selected, but also dared deeply enter, often with strong cavalry preceded their grand (general), army also had heaven fortune, never suffered exhausted.

sentences.zh: 然而諸宿將常坐留落不遇。

translations.literal: Ran er zhu su jiang chang zuo liu luo bu yu.
translations.idiomatic: But various veteran generals often sat marched fallen not encountered.

sentences.zh: 由此驃騎日以親貴，比大將軍。

translations.literal: You ci piao qi ri yi qin gui, bi da jiang jun.
translations.idiomatic: From this flying cavalry daily increasingly close noble, compared grand general.

sentences.zh: 其秋，單于怒渾邪王居西方數為漢所破，亡數萬人，以驃騎之兵也。

translations.literal: Qi qiu, chan yu nu Hun xie wang ju xi fang shu wei Han suo po, wang shu wan ren, yi piao qi zhi bing ye.
translations.idiomatic: Its autumn, chanyu angered Hunxie wang resided western direction repeatedly by Han what broken, perished several ten thousand people, with flying cavalry troops.

sentences.zh: 單于怒，欲召誅渾邪王。

translations.literal: Chan yu nu, yu zhao zhu Hun xie wang.
translations.idiomatic: Chanyu angered, wanted summoned executed Hunxie wang.

sentences.zh: 渾邪王與休屠王等謀欲降漢，使人先要邊。

translations.literal: Hun xie wang yu Xiu tu wang deng mou yu xiang Han, shi ren xian yao bian.
translations.idiomatic: Hunxie wang with Xiutu wang etc. plotted wanted surrendered Han, sent people first met border.

sentences.zh: 是時大行李息將城河上，得渾邪王使，即馳傳以聞。

translations.literal: Shi shi da xing Li Xi jiang cheng He shang, de Hun xie wang shi, ji chi chuan yi wen.
translations.idiomatic: At time great marshal Li Xi led built city river above, got Hunxie wang envoy, immediately galloped transmitted reported.

sentences.zh: 天子聞之，於是恐其以詐降而襲邊，乃令驃騎將軍將兵往迎之。

translations.literal: Tian zi wen zhi, yu shi kong qi yi zha xiang er xi bian, nai ling piao qi jiang jun jiang bing wang ying zhi.
translations.idiomatic: Emperor heard it, thereupon feared them with deception surrender but attacked border, then ordered flying cavalry general led troops went welcomed them.

sentences.zh: 驃騎既渡河，與渾邪王眾相望。

translations.literal: Piao qi ji du He, yu Hun xie wang zhong xiang wang.
translations.idiomatic: Flying cavalry already crossed river, with Hunxie wang multitude mutually gazed.

sentences.zh: 渾邪王裨將見漢軍而多欲不降者，頗遁去。

translations.literal: Hun xie wang pi jiang jian Han jun er duo yu bu xiang zhe, po dun qu.
translations.idiomatic: Hunxie wang deputy general saw Han troops and many wanted not surrender, quite fled left.

sentences.zh: 驃騎乃馳入與渾邪王相見，斬其欲亡者八千人，遂獨遣渾邪王乘傳先詣行在所，盡將其眾渡河，降者數萬，號稱十萬。

translations.literal: Piao qi nai chi ru yu Hun xie wang xiang jian, zhan qi yu wang zhe ba qian ren, sui du qian Hun xie wang cheng chuan xian yi xing zai suo, jin jiang qi zhong du He, xiang zhe shu wan, hao cheng shi wan.
translations.idiomatic: Flying cavalry then galloped entered with Hunxie wang mutually saw, beheaded their wanted flee eight thousand people, then alone sent Hunxie wang ride transmission first went emperor residence place, completely led their multitude crossed river, surrendered several ten thousand, called ten ten thousand.

sentences.zh: 既至長安，天子所以賞賜者數十巨萬。

translations.literal: Ji zhi Chang an, tian zi suo yi shang ci zhe shu shi ju wan.
translations.idiomatic: Already arrived Chang an, emperor what with reward granted several ten huge ten thousand.

sentences.zh: 封渾邪王萬戶，為漯陰侯。

translations.literal: Feng Hun xie wang wan hu, wei Luo yin hou.
translations.idiomatic: Sealed Hunxie wang ten thousand households, became Luoyin hou.

sentences.zh: 封其裨王呼毒尼為下摩侯，鷹庇為煇渠侯，禽為河綦侯，大當戶銅離為常樂侯。

translations.literal: Feng qi pi wang Hu du ni wei Xia mo hou, Ying bi wei Hui qu hou, Qin wei He qi hou, da dang hu Tong li wei Chang le hou.
translations.idiomatic: Sealed his deputy wang Huduni as Xiamo hou, Yingbi as Huiqu hou, Qin as Heqi hou, great dang hu Tongli as Changle hou.

sentences.zh: 於是天子嘉驃騎之功曰：「驃騎將軍去病率師攻匈奴西域王渾邪，王及厥眾萌咸相奔，率以軍糧接食，并將控弦萬有餘人，誅獟駻，獲首虜八千餘級，降異國之王三十二人，戰士不離傷，十萬之眾咸懷集服，仍與之勞，爰及河塞，庶幾無患，幸既永綏矣。

translations.literal: Yu shi tian zi jia piao qi zhi gong yue: "Piao qi jiang jun Qu Bing lv shi gong Xiong nu xi yu wang Hun xie, wang ji jue zhong meng xian xiang ben, lv yi jun liang jie shi, bing jiang kong xian wan you yu ren, zhu lie ju, huo shou lu ba qian yu ji, xiang yi guo zhi wang san shi er ren, zhan shi bu li shang, shi wan zhi zhong xian huai ji fu, reng yu zhi lao, ai ji He sai, shu ji wu huan, xing ji yong sui yi.
translations.idiomatic: Thereupon emperor praised flying cavalry merit: "Flying cavalry general Huo Qubing led troops attacked Xiongnu western domain wang Hunxie, wang and his multitude all mutually fled, led with army provisions connected fed, combined led controlled bows ten thousand remainder people, executed fierce horses, obtained heads captives eight thousand remainder levels, surrendered different countries wang thirty two people, warriors not separated injured, ten ten thousand multitude all cherished assembled submitted, moreover gave them labor, reached river passes, almost no worry, fortune already forever pacified.

sentences.zh: 以千七百戶益封驃騎將軍。」

translations.literal: Yi qian qi bai hu yi feng piao qi jiang jun."
translations.idiomatic: With thousand seven hundred households increased sealed flying cavalry general."

sentences.zh: 減隴西、北地、上郡戍卒之半，以寬天下之繇。

translations.literal: Jian Long xi, Bei di, Shang jun shu zu zhi ban, yi kuan tian xia zhi you.
translations.idiomatic: Reduced Longxi, Beidi, Shangjun garrison troops half, to relax realm corvee.

sentences.zh: 居頃之，乃分徙降者邊五郡故塞外，而皆在河南，因其故俗，為屬國。

translations.literal: Ju qing zhi, nai fen xu xiang zhe bian wu jun gu sai wai, er jie zai He nan, yin qi gu su, wei shu guo.
translations.idiomatic: Resided short time, then divided moved surrendered border five commanderies old pass outside, and all in Henan, followed their old customs, became subordinate countries.

sentences.zh: 其明年，匈奴入右北平、定襄，殺略漢千餘人。

translations.literal: Qi ming nian, Xiong nu ru you bei ping, Ding xiang, sha lve Han qian yu ren.
translations.idiomatic: Its next year, Xiongnu entered Youbeiping, Dingxiang, killed plundered Han thousand remainder people.

sentences.zh: 其明年，天子與諸將議曰：「翕侯趙信為單于畫計，常以為漢兵不能度幕輕留，今大發士卒，其勢必得所欲。」

translations.literal: Qi ming nian, tian zi yu zhu jiang yi yue: "Xi hou Zhao Xin wei chan yu hua ji, chang yi wei Han bing bu neng du mu qing liu, jin da fa shi zu, qi shi bi de suo yu."
translations.idiomatic: Its next year, emperor with various generals discussed: "Xi hou Zhao Xin for chanyu drew plan, often considered Han troops not able cross tent lightly stayed, now greatly sent soldiers, their power must get what desired."

sentences.zh: 是歲元狩四年也。

translations.literal: Shi sui Yuan shou si nian ye.
translations.idiomatic: This year Yuanshou fourth year.

sentences.zh: 元狩四年春，上令大將軍青、驃騎將軍去病將各五萬騎，步兵轉者踵軍數十萬，而敢力戰深入之士皆屬驃騎。

translations.literal: Yuan shou si nian chun, shang ling da jiang jun Qing, piao qi jiang jun Qu Bing jiang ge wu wan qi, bu bing zhuan zhe zhong jun shu shi wan, er gan li zhan shen ru zhi shi jie shu piao qi.
translations.idiomatic: Yuanshou fourth year spring, emperor ordered grand general Qing, flying cavalry general Huo Qubing led each five ten thousand cavalry, infantry transported followed army several ten thousand, and dared vigorous battle deeply enter warriors all belonged flying cavalry.

sentences.zh: 驃騎始為出定襄，當單于。

translations.literal: Piao qi shi wei chu Ding xiang, dang chan yu.
translations.idiomatic: Flying cavalry began as out Dingxiang, faced chanyu.

sentences.zh: 捕虜言單于東，乃更令驃騎出代郡，令大將軍出定襄。

translations.literal: Bu lu yan chan yu dong, nai geng ling piao qi chu Dai jun, ling da jiang jun chu Ding xiang.
translations.idiomatic: Captured captives spoke chanyu east, then moreover ordered flying cavalry out Daijun, ordered grand general out Dingxiang.

sentences.zh: 郎中令為前將軍，太仆為左將軍，主爵趙食其為右將軍，平陽侯襄為後將軍，皆屬大將軍。

translations.literal: Lang zhong ling wei qian jiang jun, tai pu wei zuo jiang jun, zhu jue Zhao Shi qi wei you jiang jun, Ping yang hou Xiang wei hou jiang jun, jie shu da jiang jun.
translations.idiomatic: Palace secretary became front general, taipu became left general, chief noble Zhao Shiqi became right general, Pingyang hou Xiang became rear general, all belonged grand general.

sentences.zh: 兵即度幕，人馬凡五萬騎，與驃騎等咸擊匈奴單于。

translations.literal: Bing ji du mu, ren ma fan wu wan qi, yu piao qi deng xian ji Xiong nu chan yu.
translations.idiomatic: Troops immediately crossed tent, people horses altogether five ten thousand cavalry, with flying cavalry etc. all attacked Xiongnu chanyu.

sentences.zh: 趙信為單于謀曰：「漢兵既度幕，人馬罷，匈奴可坐收虜耳。」

translations.literal: Zhao Xin wei chan yu mou yue: "Han bing ji du mu, ren ma ba, Xiong nu ke zuo shou lu er."
translations.idiomatic: Zhao Xin for chanyu planned: "Han troops already crossed tent, people horses tired, Xiongnu can sit receive captives."

sentences.zh: 乃悉遠北其輜重，皆以精兵待幕北。

translations.literal: Nai xi yuan bei qi zi zhong, jie yi jing bing dai mu bei.
translations.idiomatic: Then all far north their baggage heavy, all with elite troops awaited tent north.

sentences.zh: 而適值大將軍軍出塞千餘里，見單于兵陳而待，於是大將軍令武剛車自環為營，而縱五千騎往當匈奴。

translations.literal: Er shi zhi da jiang jun jun chu sai qian yu li, jian chan yu bing chen er dai, yu shi da jiang jun ling wu gang che zi huan wei ying, er zong wu qian qi wang dang Xiong nu.
translations.idiomatic: And coincidentally met grand general army out pass thousand remainder li, saw chanyu troops arrayed awaited, thereupon grand general ordered martial strong chariots self encircled as camp, and released five thousand cavalry went faced Xiongnu.

sentences.zh: 匈奴亦縱可萬騎。

translations.literal: Xiong nu yi zong ke wan qi.
translations.idiomatic: Xiongnu also released could ten thousand cavalry.

sentences.zh: 會日且入，大風起，沙礫擊面，兩軍不相見，漢益縱左右翼繞單于。

translations.literal: Hui ri qie ru, da feng qi, sha li ji mian, liang jun bu xiang jian, Han yi zong zuo you yi rao chan yu.
translations.idiomatic: Met sun almost entered, great wind rose, sand gravel struck face, two armies not mutually saw, Han moreover released left right wings surrounded chanyu.

sentences.zh: 單于視漢兵多，而士馬尚彊，戰而匈奴不利，薄莫，單于遂乘六驘，壯騎可數百，直冒漢圍西北馳去。

translations.literal: Chan yu shi Han bing duo, er shi ma shang qiang, zhan er Xiong nu bu li, bo mu, chan yu sui cheng liu lu, zhuang qi ke shu bai, zhi mao Han wei xi bei chi qu.
translations.idiomatic: Chanyu saw Han troops many, and soldiers horses still strong, battled and Xiongnu disadvantageous, near dusk, chanyu then rode six li horses, strong cavalry could several hundred, straight charged Han surround northwest galloped left.

sentences.zh: 時已昏，漢匈奴相紛挐，殺傷大當。

translations.literal: Shi yi hun, Han Xiong nu xiang fen qian, sha shang da dang.
translations.idiomatic: At time already dark, Han Xiongnu mutually confused fought, killed wounded great equal.

sentences.zh: 漢軍左校捕虜言單于未昏而去，漢軍因發輕騎夜追之，大將軍軍因隨其後。

translations.literal: Han jun zuo xiao bu lu yan chan yu wei hun er qu, Han jun yin fa qing qi ye zhui zhi, da jiang jun jun yin sui qi hou.
translations.idiomatic: Han army left colonel captured captives spoke chanyu not dark left, Han army because sent light cavalry night pursued him, grand general army because followed their after.

sentences.zh: 匈奴兵亦散走。

translations.literal: Xiong nu bing yi san zou.
translations.idiomatic: Xiongnu troops also scattered fled.

sentences.zh: 遲明，行二百餘里，不得單于，頗捕斬首虜萬餘級，遂至窴顏山趙信城，得匈奴積粟食軍。

translations.literal: Chi ming, xing er bai yu li, bu de chan yu, po bu zhan shou lu wan yu ji, sui zhi Tian yan shan Zhao Xin cheng, de Xiong nu ji su shi jun.
translations.idiomatic: Dawn delayed, marched two hundred remainder li, not got chanyu, quite captured beheaded heads captives ten thousand remainder levels, then arrived Tianyan mountain Zhao Xin city, got Xiongnu accumulated grain fed army.

sentences.zh: 軍留一日而還，悉燒其城餘粟以歸。

translations.literal: Jun liu yi ri er huan, xi shao qi cheng yu su yi gui.
translations.idiomatic: Army stayed one day returned, all burned their city remainder grain to return.

sentences.zh: 大將軍之與單于會也，而前將軍廣、右將軍食其軍別從東道，或失道，後擊單于。

translations.literal: Da jiang jun zhi yu chan yu hui ye, er qian jiang jun Guang, you jiang jun Shi qi jun bie cong dong dao, huo shi dao, hou ji chan yu.
translations.idiomatic: Grand general what with chanyu met, and front general Guang, right general Shiqi army separately followed east road, or lost road, after attacked chanyu.

sentences.zh: 大將軍引還過幕南，乃得前將軍、右將軍。

translations.literal: Da jiang jun yin huan guo mu nan, nai de qian jiang jun, you jiang jun.
translations.idiomatic: Grand general led returned passed tent south, then got front general, right general.

sentences.zh: 大將軍欲使使歸報，令長史簿責前將軍廣，廣自殺。

translations.literal: Da jiang jun yu shi shi gui bao, ling chang shi bu ze qian jiang jun Guang, Guang zi sha.
translations.idiomatic: Grand general wanted made envoy return reported, ordered chancellor secretary recorded blamed front general Guang, Guang self killed.

sentences.zh: 右將軍至，下吏，贖為庶人。

translations.literal: You jiang jun zhi, xia li, shu wei shu ren.
translations.idiomatic: Right general arrived, sent down officials, redeemed as commoner.

sentences.zh: 大將軍軍入塞，凡斬捕首虜萬九千級。

translations.literal: Da jiang jun jun ru sai, fan zhan bu shou lu wan jiu qian ji.
translations.idiomatic: Grand general army entered pass, altogether beheaded captured heads captives nineteen thousand levels.

sentences.zh: 是時匈奴眾失單于十餘日，右谷蠡王聞之，自立為單于。

translations.literal: Shi shi Xiong nu zhong shi chan yu shi yu ri, you Gu li wang wen zhi, zi li wei chan yu.
translations.idiomatic: At time Xiongnu multitude lost chanyu ten remainder days, right Guli wang heard it, self established as chanyu.

sentences.zh: 單于後得其眾，右王乃去單于之號。

translations.literal: Chan yu hou de qi zhong, you wang nai qu chan yu zhi hao.
translations.idiomatic: Chanyu after got his multitude, right wang then abandoned chanyu title.

sentences.zh: 驃騎將軍亦將五萬騎，車重與大將軍軍等，而無裨將。

translations.literal: Piao qi jiang jun yi jiang wu wan qi, che zhong yu da jiang jun jun deng, er wu pi jiang.
translations.idiomatic: Flying cavalry general also led five ten thousand cavalry, chariot heavy with grand general army equal, but no deputy generals.

sentences.zh: 悉以李敢等為大校，當裨將，出代、右北平千餘里，直左方兵，所斬捕功已多大將軍。

translations.literal: Xi yi Li Gan deng wei da xiao, dang pi jiang, chu Dai, you bei ping qian yu li, zhi zuo fang bing, suo zhan bu gong yi duo da jiang jun.
translations.idiomatic: All with Li Gan etc. as great colonels, acted deputy generals, out Dai, Youbeiping thousand remainder li, straight left side troops, what beheaded captured merit already many grand general.

sentences.zh: 軍既還，天子曰：「驃騎將軍去病率師，躬將所獲葷粥之士，約輕齎，絕大幕，涉獲章渠，以誅比車耆，轉擊左大將，斬獲旗鼓，歷涉離侯。

translations.literal: Jun ji huan, tian zi yue: "Piao qi jiang jun Qu Bing lv shi, gong jiang suo huo Xun zhou zhi shi, yue qing ji, jue da mu, she Huo zhang qu, yi zhu Bi che qi, zhuan ji zuo da jiang, zhan huo qi gu, li she Li hou.
translations.idiomatic: Army already returned, emperor said: "Flying cavalry general Huo Qubing led troops, personally led what obtained Xunzhou warriors, agreed light provisions, cut great tent, crossed Huo Zhang qu, to executed Biche qi, transferred attacked left great general, beheaded obtained flags drums, passed Li Hou.

sentences.zh: 濟弓閭，獲屯頭王、韓王等三人，將軍、相國、當戶、都尉八十三人，封狼居胥山，禪於姑衍，登臨翰海。

translations.literal: Ji Gong lv, huo Tun tou wang, Han wang deng san ren, jiang jun, xiang guo, dang hu, du wei ba shi san ren, feng Lang ju xu shan, shan yu Gu yan, deng lin Han hai.
translations.idiomatic: Crossed Gong lv, obtained Tun tou wang, Han wang etc. three people, generals, chancellors, dang hu, commandery governors eighty three people, sealed Langjuxu mountain, sacrificed at Guyan, ascended faced Han sea.

sentences.zh: 執鹵獲丑七萬有四百四十三級，師率減什三，取食於敵，閒行殊遠而糧不絕，以五千八百戶益封驃騎將軍。」

translations.literal: Zhi lu huo chou qi wan you si bai si shi san ji, shi lv jian shi san, qu shi yu di, jian xing shu yuan er liang bu jue, yi wu qian ba bai hu yi feng piao qi jiang jun."
translations.idiomatic: Captured captives obtained leaders seven ten thousand four hundred forty three levels, army reduced ten three, took food from enemy, distant marched very far but provisions not exhausted, with five thousand eight hundred households increased sealed flying cavalry general."

sentences.zh: 右北平太守路博德屬驃騎將軍，會與城，不失期，從至梼余山，斬首捕虜二千七百級，以千六百戶封博德為符離侯。

translations.literal: You bei ping tai shou Lu Bo de shu piao qi jiang jun, hui yu cheng, bu shi qi, cong zhi Tao yu shan, zhan shou bu lu er qian qi bai ji, yi qian liu bai hu feng Bo de wei Fu li hou.
translations.idiomatic: Youbeiping governor Lu Bode belonged flying cavalry general, met with walled city, not lost period, followed to Taoyu mountain, beheaded heads captured captives two thousand seven hundred levels, with thousand six hundred households sealed Bode as Fuli hou.

sentences.zh: 北地都尉邢山從驃騎將軍獲王，以千二百戶封山為義陽侯。

translations.literal: Bei di du wei Xing Shan cong piao qi jiang jun huo wang, yi qian er bai hu feng Shan wei Yi yang hou.
translations.idiomatic: Beidi commandery governor Xing Shan followed flying cavalry general obtained wang, with thousand two hundred households sealed Shan as Yiyang hou.

sentences.zh: 故歸義因淳王復陸支、樓專王伊即靬皆從驃騎將軍有功，以千三百戶封復陸支為壯侯，以千八百戶封伊即靬為眾利侯。

translations.literal: Gu gui yi Yin Chun wang Fu Lu zhi, Lou zhuan wang Yi ji Jian jie cong piao qi jiang jun you gong, yi qian san bai hu feng Fu Lu zhi wei Zhuang hou, yi qian ba bai hu feng Yi ji Jian wei Zhong li hou.
translations.idiomatic: Former returned righteousness Yin Chun wang Fu Lu zhi, Lou zhuan wang Yi ji Jian all followed flying cavalry general had merit, with thousand three hundred households sealed Fu Lu zhi as Zhuang hou, with thousand eight hundred households sealed Yi ji Jian as Zhongli hou.

sentences.zh: 從驃侯破奴、昌武侯安稽從驃騎有功，益封各三百戶。

translations.literal: Cong piao hou Po nu, Chang wu hou An Ji cong piao qi you gong, yi feng ge san bai hu.
translations.idiomatic: Congpiao hou Po nu, Changwu hou An Ji followed flying cavalry had merit, increased sealed each three hundred households.

sentences.zh: 校尉敢得旗鼓，為關內侯，食邑二百戶。

translations.literal: Xiao wei Gan de qi gu, wei guan nei hou, shi yi er bai hu.
translations.idiomatic: Colonel Gan got flags drums, became Guannei hou, ate fief two hundred households.

sentences.zh: 校尉自為爵大庶長。

translations.literal: Xiao wei Zi wei jue da shu zhang.
translations.idiomatic: Colonel Ziwei nobility great shuzhang.

sentences.zh: 軍吏卒為官，賞賜甚多。

translations.literal: Jun li zu wei guan, shang ci shen duo.
translations.idiomatic: Army officials soldiers became officials, reward granted very many.

sentences.zh: 而大將軍不得益封，軍吏卒皆無封侯者。

translations.literal: Er da jiang jun bu de yi feng, jun li zu jie wu feng hou zhe.
translations.idiomatic: And grand general not got increased sealed, army officials soldiers all no sealed hou ones.

sentences.zh: 兩軍之出塞，塞閱官及私馬凡十四萬匹，而復入塞者不滿三萬匹。

translations.literal: Liang jun zhi chu sai, sai yue guan ji si ma fan shi si wan pi, er fu ru sai zhe bu man san wan pi.
translations.idiomatic: Two armies what out pass, pass inspected officials and private horses altogether fourteen ten thousand horses, but again entered pass not full three ten thousand horses.

sentences.zh: 乃益置大司馬位，大將軍、驃騎將軍皆為大司馬。

translations.literal: Nai yi zhi da si ma wei, da jiang jun, piao qi jiang jun jie wei da si ma.
translations.idiomatic: Then moreover established grand marshal position, grand general, flying cavalry general all became grand marshal.

sentences.zh: 定令，令驃騎將軍秩祿與大將軍等。

translations.literal: Ding ling, ling piao qi jiang jun zhi lu yu da jiang jun deng.
translations.idiomatic: Settled command, commanded flying cavalry general rank salary with grand general equal.

sentences.zh: 自是之後，大將軍青日退，而驃騎日益貴。

sentences.zh: 從大將軍有功，封為博望侯。

translations.idiomatic: Followed grand general had merit, sealed as Bowang hou.

sentences.zh: 後三歲，為將軍，出右北平，失期，當斬，贖為庶人。

translations.literal: Hou san sui, wei jiang jun, chu you bei ping, shi qi, dang zhan, shu wei shu ren.
translations.idiomatic: After three years, became general, out Youbeiping, lost period, should behead, redeemed as commoner.

sentences.zh: 其後使通烏孫，為大行而卒，冢在漢中。

translations.literal: Qi hou shi tong Wu sun, wei da xing er zu, zhong zai Han zhong.
translations.idiomatic: His after sent connected Wusun, became grand marshal and died, tomb in Hanzhong.

sentences.zh: 將軍趙食其，祋祤人也。

translations.literal: Jiang jun Zhao Shi qi, Du fu ren ye.
translations.idiomatic: General Zhao Shiqi, Dufu person.

sentences.zh: 武帝立二十二歲，以主爵為右將軍，從大將軍出定襄，迷失道，當斬，贖為庶人。

translations.literal: Wu di li er shi er sui, yi zhu jue wei you jiang jun, cong da jiang jun chu Ding xiang, mi shi dao, dang zhan, shu wei shu ren.
translations.idiomatic: Wu di established twenty two years, with chief noble became right general, followed grand general out Dingxiang, lost road, should behead, redeemed as commoner.

sentences.zh: 將軍曹襄，以平陽侯為後將軍，從大將軍出定襄。

translations.literal: Jiang jun Cao Xiang, yi Ping yang hou wei hou jiang jun, cong da jiang jun chu Ding xiang.
translations.idiomatic: General Cao Xiang, with Pingyang hou became rear general, followed grand general out Dingxiang.

sentences.zh: 襄，曹參孫也。

translations.literal: Xiang, Cao Can sun ye.
translations.idiomatic: Xiang, Cao Can grandson.

sentences.zh: 將軍韓說，弓高侯庶孫也。

translations.literal: Jiang jun Han Shuo, Gong gao hou shu sun ye.
translations.idiomatic: General Han Shuo, Gonggao hou collateral grandson.

sentences.zh: 以校尉從大將軍有功，為龍頟侯，坐酎金失侯。

translations.literal: Yi xiao wei cong da jiang jun you gong, wei Long e hou, zuo chou jin shi hou.
translations.idiomatic: With colonel followed grand general had merit, became Longe hou, sat tribute gold lost hou.

sentences.zh: 元鼎六年，以待詔為橫海將軍，擊東越有功，為按道侯。

translations.literal: Yuan ding liu nian, yi dai zhao wei Heng hai jiang jun, ji Dong Yue you gong, wei An dao hou.
translations.idiomatic: Yuanding sixth year, with awaiting decree became Henghai general, attacked Dong Yue had merit, became Andao hou.

sentences.zh: 以太初三年為游擊將軍，屯於五原外列城。

translations.literal: Yi Tai chu san nian wei you ji jiang jun, tun yu Wu yuan wai lie cheng.
translations.idiomatic: With Taichu third year became youji general, garrisoned at Wuyuan outer lined cities.

sentences.zh: 為光祿勳，掘蠱太子宮，衛太子殺之。

translations.literal: Wei Guang lu xun, jue gu tai zi gong, Wei tai zi sha zhi.
translations.idiomatic: Became Guanglu xun, dug witchcraft crown prince palace, Wei crown prince killed him.

sentences.zh: 將軍郭昌，雲中人也。

translations.literal: Jiang jun Guo Chang, Yun zhong ren ye.
translations.idiomatic: General Guo Chang, Yunzhong person.

sentences.zh: 以校尉從大將軍。

translations.literal: Yi xiao wei cong da jiang jun.
translations.idiomatic: With colonel followed grand general.

sentences.zh: 元封四年，以太中大夫為拔胡將軍，屯朔方。

translations.literal: Yuan feng si nian, yi tai zhong da fu wei ba Hu jiang jun, tun Shuo fang.
translations.idiomatic: Yuanfeng fourth year, with grand central grand master became ba Hu general, garrisoned Shuofang.

sentences.zh: 還擊昆明，毋功，奪印。

translations.literal: Huan ji Kun ming, wu gong, duo yin.
translations.idiomatic: Returned attacked Kunming, no merit, took seal.

sentences.zh: 將軍荀彘，太原廣武人。

translations.literal: Jiang jun Xun Zhu, Tai yuan Guang wu ren.
translations.idiomatic: General Xun Zhu, Taiyuan Guangwu person.

sentences.zh: 以御見，侍中，為校尉，數從大將軍。

translations.literal: Yi yu jian, shi zhong, wei xiao wei, shu cong da jiang jun.
translations.idiomatic: With imperial attendant seen, palace attendant, became colonel, repeatedly followed grand general.

sentences.zh: 以元封三年為左將軍擊朝鮮，毋功。

translations.literal: Yi Yuan feng san nian wei zuo jiang jun ji Chao xian, wu gong.
translations.idiomatic: With Yuanfeng third year became left general attacked Chaoxian, no merit.

sentences.zh: 以捕樓船將軍坐法死。

translations.literal: Yi bu Lou chuan jiang jun zuo fa si.
translations.idiomatic: With captured Lou chuan general sat law died.

sentences.zh: 最驃騎將軍去病，凡六出擊匈奴，其四出以將軍，斬捕首虜十一萬餘級。

translations.literal: Zui piao qi jiang jun Qu Bing, fan liu chu ji Xiong nu, qi si chu yi jiang jun, zhan bu shou lu shi yi wan yu ji.
translations.idiomatic: Greatest flying cavalry general Huo Qubing, altogether six out attacked Xiongnu, his four out with general, beheaded captured heads captives eleven ten thousand remainder levels.

sentences.zh: 及渾邪王以眾降數萬，遂開河西酒泉之地，西方益少胡寇。

translations.literal: Ji Hun xie wang yi zhong xiang shu wan, sui kai He xi Jiu quan zhi di, xi fang yi shao Hu kou.
translations.idiomatic: And Hunxie wang with multitude surrendered several ten thousand, then opened Hexi Jiuquan land, western direction increasingly few Hu invaders.

sentences.zh: 四益封，凡萬五千一百戶。

translations.literal: Si yi feng, fan wan wu qian yi bai hu.
translations.idiomatic: Four increased sealed, altogether ten thousand five thousand one hundred households.

sentences.zh: 其校吏有功為侯者凡六人，而後為將軍二人。

translations.literal: Qi xiao li you gong wei hou zhe fan liu ren, er hou wei jiang jun er ren.
translations.idiomatic: His colonels had merit became hou ones altogether six people, and later became generals two people.

sentences.zh: 將軍路博德，平州人。

translations.literal: Jiang jun Lu Bo de, Ping zhou ren.
translations.idiomatic: General Lu Bode, Pingzhou person.

sentences.zh: 以右北平太守從驃騎將軍有功，為符離侯。

translations.literal: Yi you bei ping tai shou cong piao qi jiang jun you gong, wei Fu li hou.
translations.idiomatic: With Youbeiping governor followed flying cavalry general had merit, became Fuli hou.

sentences.zh: 驃騎死後，博德以衛尉為伏波將軍，伐破南越，益封。

translations.literal: Piao qi si hou, Bo de yi wei wei wei Fu bo jiang jun, fa po Nan Yue, yi feng.
translations.idiomatic: Flying cavalry died after, Bode with guard wei became Fu bo general, attacked broke Nanyue, increased sealed.

sentences.zh: 其後坐法失侯。

translations.literal: Qi hou zuo fa shi hou.
translations.idiomatic: His after sat law lost hou.

sentences.zh: 為彊弩都尉，屯居延，卒。

translations.literal: Wei Qiang nu du wei, tun Ju yan, zu.
translations.idiomatic: Became Qiangnu commandery governor, garrisoned Juyan, died.

sentences.zh: 將軍趙破奴，故九原人。

translations.literal: Jiang jun Zhao Po nu, gu Jiu yuan ren.
translations.idiomatic: General Zhao Ponu, originally Jiu yuan person.

sentences.zh: 嘗亡入匈奴，已而歸漢，為驃騎將軍司馬。

translations.literal: Chang wang ru Xiong nu, yi er gui Han, wei piao qi jiang jun si ma.
translations.idiomatic: Once fled entered Xiongnu, already then returned Han, became flying cavalry general adjutant.

sentences.zh: 出北地時有功，封為從驃侯。

translations.literal: Chu Bei di shi you gong, feng wei Cong piao hou.
translations.idiomatic: Out Beidi time had merit, sealed as Congpiao hou.

sentences.zh: 坐酎金失侯。

translations.literal: Zuo chou jin shi hou.
translations.idiomatic: Sat tribute gold lost hou.

sentences.zh: 後一歲，為匈河將軍，攻胡至匈河水，無功。

translations.literal: Hou yi sui, wei Xiong he jiang jun, gong Hu zhi Xiong he shui, wu gong.
translations.idiomatic: After one year, became Xiong he general, attacked Hu to Xiong he water, no merit.

sentences.zh: 後二歲，擊虜樓蘭王，復封為浞野侯。

translations.literal: Hou er sui, ji lu Lou lan wang, fu feng wei Zhu ye hou.
translations.idiomatic: After two years, attacked captured Lou lan wang, again sealed as Zhuye hou.

sentences.zh: 後六歲，為浚稽將軍，將二萬騎擊匈奴左賢王，左賢王與戰，兵八萬騎圍破奴，破奴生為虜所得，遂沒其軍。
居匈奴中十歲，復與其太子安國亡入漢。
後坐巫蠱，族。
自衛氏興，大將軍青首封，其後枝屬為五侯。
凡二十四歲而五侯盡奪，衛氏無為侯者。
太史公曰：蘇建語余曰：「吾嘗責大將軍至尊重，而天下之賢大夫毋稱焉，願將軍觀古名將所招選擇賢者，勉之哉。
大將軍謝曰：『自魏其、武安之厚賓客，天子常切齒。
彼親附士大夫，招賢絀不肖者，人主之柄也。
人臣奉法遵職而已，何與招士！』」
驃騎亦放此意，其為將如此。
